isis.stitle: EC-17 ANTILOCK TRACTION CONTROLLER - INSTALLING ACOM FOR WINDOWS SOFTWARE

svcproc.title: INTRODUCTION
svcproc.para: ACom for Windows is a PC-based software tool designed for AlliedSignal's Bendix AntiLock and Traction brake system.
It is used in conjunction with the AlliedSignal Diagnostic Communication Interface or DCI and allows the maintenance technician to perform a number of tasks using commands from the PC.

item.para: Test individual components for proper operation.
Obtain, view and store a history of specific fault occurrences.
Record performance of components during actual vehicle operation.

svcproc.para: ACom for Windows is available packaged with the AlliedSignal DCI diagnostic communication interface as a 2 disk set or separately. ACom software alone is kit part number 5004892 and the DCI with ACom is kit part number 5004894.

note.para: Acom for Windows requires the use of the AlliedSignal DCI, or an equivalent unit to permit proper communications between the vehicle's numerous onboard controllers and the personal computer (PC).
